subject: Swimming
Olympic Games
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: In two years, Katie Ledecky has shaved eight seconds off the world record in the 1,500-meter freestyle, but swimming’s governing body continues to resist calls to add the event to the Olympics.
snippet: In two years, Katie Ledecky has shaved eight seconds off the world record in the 1,500-meter freestyle, but swimming’s governing body continues to resist calls to add the event to the Olympics.
